class_notes: This is an online synchronous course.
course_description: Develops tools to understand the microbiological, behavioral, and economic factors that contribute to the expanding epidemic of infectious diseases that may become untreatable due to the emergence of resistance. Provides a framework for intervention studies. Cross-listed with GH 558.
sections: Class Nbr: 4676, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 3:15-5:05p, Instructor: Jacob/Murali, Status: Open
